roleset.name: to walk or proceed with a slow heavy pace
roleset.note: SLOG-V NOTES: Member of Vncls run-51.3.2. (from slog.01-v)

example.name: both arguments
example.text: The petite , 29-year-old Ms. Johnson , dressed [*] in jeans and a sweatshirt as she slogs through the steady afternoon rain , is a claims adjuster with Aetna Life& Casualty .
